pkgmetadata.longdescription:
xmms-kde is a MP3 player integrated into the KDE panel. It can also be used to control XMMS and Noatun from the panel.
What are the features?
start/pause/stop the player jump back/forward in the playlist drag'n'drop files from the filemanager on-screen-display to show the title of the song that starts playing database support for Ogg / MP3 files (since version 3.1 beta1) You can do most of these things by using the mouse or customizable keyboard shortcuts. You can use diffrent themes
